Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.mil

Class HeaterStateModel

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.mil.HeaterStateModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeaterOperationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, Serializable
@ModelExternalEvents(imported={SwitchOnHeater.class,SwitchOffHeater.class,SetPowerHeater.class,Heat.class,DoNotHeat.class}, exported={SwitchOnHeater.class,SwitchOffHeater.class,SetPowerHeater.class,Heat.class,DoNotHeat.class}) public class HeaterStateModel extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel implements HeaterOperationI
The class HeaterStateModel is a simple model that tracks the current state of the heater as well as it receives events triggering state changes in the heater and reemits them towards the other heater models.

Description

White-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-11-23

Author:
Jacques Malenfant
